name: Thiusgodamn gae,m doesnt ev n f**cking work forr 10 omtherf** ckjng seconsd!!
name_original: Thiusgodamn gae,m doesnt ev n f**cking work forr 10 omtherf** ckjng seconsd!!
description:
Or TGDENFWF1OCS for short

In this game, you are trying to play a game that your sister created and sent to you, but the game freezes every ten seconds! Hit that computer to bring the game back! And try not to get too angry or damage your computer too much in the process, or you lose the game!

Controls

WASD or the arrow keys

Use the mouse wheel to change weapons hand posture/tool

Click outside the computer screen to hit the computer

Press enter or space to progress through the dialog

Press the R Key to restart
